keyboard_actions.search-in-subtree: Search for notes in the active note's subtree
keyboard_actions.create-note-into-inbox: Create a note in the inbox (if defined) or day note
keyboard_actions.edit-note-title: Jump from tree to the note detail and edit title
keyboard_actions.copy-notes-to-clipboard: Copy selected notes to the clipboard
keyboard_actions.paste-notes-from-clipboard: Paste notes from the clipboard into active note
keyboard_actions.cut-notes-to-clipboard: Cut selected notes to the clipboard
keyboard_actions.select-all-notes-in-parent: Select all notes from the current note level
keyboard_actions.add-note-above-to-the-selection: Add note above to the selection
keyboard_actions.add-note-below-to-selection: Add note above to the selection
keyboard_actions.toggle-tray: Shows/hides the application from the system tray
keyboard_actions.first-tab: Activates the first tab in the list
keyboard_actions.second-tab: Activates the second tab in the list
keyboard_actions.third-tab: Activates the third tab in the list
keyboard_actions.fourth-tab: Activates the fourth tab in the list
keyboard_actions.fifth-tab: Activates the fifth tab in the list
keyboard_actions.sixth-tab: Activates the sixth tab in the list
keyboard_actions.seventh-tab: Activates the seventh tab in the list
keyboard_actions.eight-tab: Activates the eighth tab in the list
keyboard_actions.ninth-tab: Activates the ninth tab in the list
keyboard_actions.last-tab: Activates the last tab in the list
keyboard_actions.add-link-to-text: Open dialog to add link to the text
keyboard_actions.follow-link-under-cursor: Follow link within which the caret is placed
keyboard_actions.insert-date-and-time-to-text: Insert current date & time into text
keyboard_actions.paste-markdown-into-text: Pastes Markdown from clipboard into text note
keyboard_actions.cut-into-note: Cuts the selection from the current note and creates subnote with the selected text
keyboard_actions.add-include-note-to-text: Opens the dialog to include a note
keyboard_actions.toggle-right-pane: Toggle the display of the right pane, which includes Table of Contents and Highlights
keyboard_actions.open-note-externally: Open note as a file with default application
keyboard_actions.toggle-note-hoisting: Toggles note hoisting of active note
keyboard_actions.force-save-revision: Force creating / saving new note revision of the active note
keyboard_actions.toggle-classic-editor-toolbar: Toggle the Formatting tab for the editor with fixed toolbar

login.title: Login
login.heading: Trilium login
login.incorrect-password: Password is incorrect. Please try again.

set_password.heading: Set password
set_password.description: Before you can start using Trilium from web, you need to set a password first. You will then use this password to login.

javascript-required: Trilium requires JavaScript to be enabled.

setup.heading: TriliumNext Notes setup
setup.new-document: I'm a new user, and I want to create a new Trilium document for my notes
setup.sync-from-desktop: I have a desktop instance already, and I want to set up sync with it
setup.sync-from-server: I have a server instance already, and I want to set up sync with it
setup.redirecting: You will be shortly redirected to the application.
setup.title: Setup

setup_sync-from-desktop.heading: Sync from Desktop
setup_sync-from-desktop.description: This setup needs to be initiated from the desktop instance:
setup_sync-from-desktop.step1: Open your desktop instance of TriliumNext Notes.
setup_sync-from-desktop.step2: From the Trilium Menu, click Options.
setup_sync-from-desktop.step4: Change server instance address to: {{- host}} and click Save.
setup_sync-from-desktop.step5: Click "Test sync" button to verify connection is successful.
setup_sync-from-desktop.step6: Once you've completed these steps, click {{- link}}.

setup_sync-from-server.heading: Sync from Server
setup_sync-from-server.instructions: Please enter Trilium server address and credentials below. This will download the whole Trilium document from server and setup sync to it. Depending on the document size and your connection speed, this may take a while.
setup_sync-from-server.proxy-instruction: If you leave proxy setting blank, system proxy will be used (applies to the desktop application only)

setup_sync-in-progress.heading: Sync in progress
setup_sync-in-progress.successful: Sync has been correctly set up. It will take some time for the initial sync to finish. Once it's done, you'll be redirected to the login page.

share_page.clipped-from: This note was originally clipped from {{- url}}

test_sync.not-configured: Sync server host is not configured. Please configure sync first.
test_sync.successful: Sync server handshake has been successful, sync has been started.
